info:
One of the musicians that seems to have lot of fun making his songs. :D
Great melodies and modulation, no matter which platform he's using, with an easy flow. :up:

Asked about permission for his commercial work (such as mighty switch force, fx4 etc.) 2012-05-07 and was given an OKAY to have these songs on our radio. / Elrinth
